hymn.title: If I'd know Christ's risen power
hymn.category: The Way of the Cross—The Way of Life

layout.singingstanza: If I'd know Christ's ris -- en pow -- er. I must ev -- er love the Cross; Life from death a -- lone a -- ris -- es; There's no gain ex -- cept by loss. If no death, no life, If no death, no life; Life from death a -- lone a -- ris -- es; If no death, no life.

lyrics.stanza: If I'd have Christ formed within me, I must breathe my final breath, Live within the Cross's shadow, Put my soul-life e'er to death.
If God thru th' Eternal Spirit Nail me ever with the Lord; Only then as death is working Will His life thru me be poured.
